definition: Cecilia Cheung (1980-), Hong Kong actress and pop singer
surname Zhang
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
(used for transcribing names)
cedar/cypress/Taiwan pr. [bo2]

Zoysia pungens

sentences.english: Ann: I just said the title of this article. Do you know Cecilia Cheung and Nicholas Tse?
sentences.chinese: 我在說這片文章的題目，你知道張柏芝和謝霆鋒吧？

sentences.english: The report revealed that Nicholas Tse was accompanying Cheung from the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 報道還透露，謝霆鋒在一開始就一直陪伴着張柏芝。

sentences.english: Some netizens say she looks even more beautiful than the star.
sentences.chinese: 一些網友評論她比張柏芝更漂亮。
我也覺得，特別是張柏芝。

sentences.english: Ann: How many children is Cecilia Cheung willing to have for Nicholas Tse?
sentences.chinese: 張柏芝願意爲謝霆鋒生幾個孩子呢？

sentences.english: Singer Nicholas Tse Ting-fung and model Cheung Pak-chi are the teen idols of the moment.
sentences.chinese: 時下青少年偶像有歌星謝霆鋒和模特兒張柏芝。

sentences.english: I compare in the eyes of husband and wife is famous star Cecilia Cheung and Nicholas Tse.
sentences.chinese: 在我眼中比較出名的明星夫妻就是張柏芝和謝霆鋒。

sentences.english: Ann: Yes, but Cecilia said that she wanted to have three kids after she got married.
sentences.chinese: 是的，但是張柏芝說過她結婚後想要三個小孩。
